questions.question: Which of these is NOT an element of participation?

choices.answer: Making a tiktok of the teachers
Work that is done "live" and "in class"
Work that is done independently outside of "live" class time
All work submitted on google classroom

questions.question: Which of these is NOT an example of "synchronous" work?

choices.answer: Reading a document to prepare for the next day's class
Doing an exit ticket google form

questions.question: How should you communicate with your global teachers?

choices.answer: Add comments before checking for the answer on google classroom
Send an email with a specific subject, name, date, and period
